Module org.microbean.type
Package org.microbean.type

Class DefaultTypeVariable<T extends GenericDeclaration>

java.lang.Object
org.microbean.type.DefaultTypeVariable<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the kind of GenericDeclaration that this DefaultTypeVariable was declared by
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constable, AnnotatedElement, Type, TypeVariable<T>
public final class DefaultTypeVariable<T extends GenericDeclaration> extends Object implements Constable, TypeVariable<T>
A TypeVariable implementation.
Author:
Laird Nelson

  • Constructor Details

    • DefaultTypeVariable

      public DefaultTypeVariable(TypeVariable<? extends T> other)
      Creates a new DefaultTypeVariable.
      Parameters:
      other - a TypeVariable providing important locating information; must not be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if other is null

    • DefaultTypeVariable

      public DefaultTypeVariable(GenericDeclaration genericDeclaration, String name)
      Creates a new DefaultTypeVariable.
      Parameters:
      genericDeclaration - a GenericDeclaration whose type variables will be inspected; must not be null
      name - the value that the return value of an invocation of TypeVariable.getName() must have when invoked on a member of the array returned by an invocation of GenericDeclaration.getTypeParameters() on the supplied genericDeclaration; must not be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if genericDeclaration is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied name identifies no TypeVariables

    • DefaultTypeVariable

      public DefaultTypeVariable(GenericDeclaration genericDeclaration, Predicate<? super TypeVariable<?>> predicate)
      Creates a new DefaultTypeVariable.
      Parameters:
      genericDeclaration - a GenericDeclaration whose type variables will be inspected; must not be null
      predicate - the Predicate that will identify the TypeVariable that this DefaultTypeVariable will wrap; must not be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either genericDeclaration or predicate is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied Predicate identifies no TypeVariables

  • Method Details

    • getDelegate

      public final TypeVariable<? extends T> getDelegate()
      Returns the TypeVariable this DefaultTypeVariable wraps.
      Returns:
      the TypeVariable this DefaultTypeVariable wraps; never null
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent and deterministic.
      Nullability:
      This method never returns null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.

    • of

      public static final <T extends GenericDeclaration> DefaultTypeVariable<T> of(TypeVariable<T> type)
      Returns a DefaultTypeVariable representing the supplied TypeVariable.

      If the supplied TypeVariable is:

      • null: null is returned
      • an instance of DefaultTypeVariable: the supplied type is returned
      • anything else: a new DefaultTypeVariable is returned
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of GenericDeclaration that declares the type variable
      Parameters:
      type - the TypeVariable in question; may be null in which case null will be returned
      Returns:
      a DefaultTypeVariable, or null
      Idempotency:
      This method is idempotent and deterministic.
      Nullability:
      This method may return null.
      Thread Safety:
      This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple threads.
